body.p: offers a plugin to integrate an AI Positron pane that provides an advanced solution for using AI assistance to enhance the documentation content creation process. By leveraging the power of AI platforms, the AI Positron streamlines and enhances the writing experience by providing a variety of helpful AI-based actions and features, ways to chat and refine responses, and much more.
For information about the AI Positron pane its features, see AI Positron Pane (Web Author).
For installation and configuration details, see Oxygen AI Positron for Web Author.
